title: Mar Caribe Center
description: This project is a website that aims to display the prices and availability of products from the company "Mar Caribe Center", it was developed with pure PHP, Bootstrap and some JavaScript libraries such as DataTables and Jquery, this was my first project and does not have adequate security due to the absence of a back-end framework.

title: BachaCode
description: This portfolio is a static page website generated with Astro, it started as one of the first projects that i did by myself and was developed with TailwindCSS, AlpineJS, and Astro as previously mentioned, it is a constanly evolving pet project that i use as a way to learn and show new things!

title: PHPetite
description: PHPetite is a PHP framework made to create websites with the MVC arquitecture, has a router that allows HTTP requests to be handled securely and efficiently. It is still in development and will have more features in the future.!

title: Sorting Visualizer
description: Small application made with vanilla JavaScript that allows to sort random arrays in ascending order using the "Bubble Sort" sorting algorithm.

title: Todo App
description: JavaScript web application that allows you to save a list of pending tasks separated by categories and that are saved in local storage so they are persistent between sessions.

title: Blog Laravel
description: Blog developed in Laravel with the purpose of learning the bases of the framework and the TALL stack, it is not functional and was developed solely for learning purposes.
